items.sentence: You can't be too careful in choosing friends.
You've never been to Boston before, have you?
I hope that we have time to prepare for that.
Tom likes asparagus, but his brother doesn't.
This is the dog that Tom said that he wanted.
The dog was chasing chickens around the yard.
I can't get back to Boston until next Monday.
I can't go to Boston until after next Monday.
I found that speaking French was pretty easy.
Tom has no idea how serious the situation is.
Tom told Mary to stop asking silly questions.
I have a friend who has a house in Australia.
I have to stay in Australia for another week.
I may go to Australia the day after tomorrow.
I may need to stay in Australia until Monday.
I might need to go to Australia next October.
I might stay in Australia for a night or two.
I still go to Australia several times a year.
Tom comes to Australia every other Christmas.
Tom asked me how long I'd lived in Australia.
